currentTerm st) = false H : (if (if leaderId (advanceCurrentTerm st t) then false else true) && moreUpToDate lt li (maxTerm (log (advanceCurrentTerm st t))) (maxIndex (log (advanceCurrentTerm st t))) then match votedFor (advanceCurrentTerm st t) with | Some candidateId' => (advanceCurrentTerm st t, RequestVoteReply (currentTerm (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (if fin_eq_dec N c candidateId' then true else false)) | None => ({[advanceCurrentTerm st t with votedFor := Some c]}, RequestVoteReply (currentTerm (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) true) end else (advanceCurrentTerm st t, RequestVoteReply (currentTerm (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) false)) = (st', ms) H2 : (if (if leaderId (advanceCurrentTerm st t) then false else true) && moreUpToDate lt li (maxTerm (log (advanceCurrentTerm st t))) (maxIndex (log (advanceCurrentTerm st t))) then match votedFor (advanceCurrentTerm st t) with | Some candidateId' => (advanceCurrentTerm st t, RequestVoteReply (currentTerm (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (if fin_eq_dec N c candidateId' then true else false)) | None => (mkRaft_data (currentTerm (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (Some c) (leaderId (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (log (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (commitIndex (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (lastApplied (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (stateMachine (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (nextIndex (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (matchIndex (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (shouldSend (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (votesReceived (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (type (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (clientCache (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) (electoralVictories (advanceCurrentTerm st t)), RequestVoteReply (currentTerm (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) true) end else (advanceCurrentTerm st t, RequestVoteReply (currentTerm (advanceCurrentTerm st t)) false)) = (st', ms) Unable to unify "log st" with "log st'".

I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params

N = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (N, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> nat Arguments N {orig_base_params RaftParams}

Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope

Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%bool_scope

reboot = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => mkRaft_data (currentTerm state) (votedFor state) (leaderId state) (log state) (commitIndex state) (lastApplied state) (stateMachine state) [] [] false [] Follower (clientCache state) (electoralVictories state) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> raft_data Arguments reboot {orig_base_params raft_params}
raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_reboot = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> nwPackets net = nwPackets net' -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_reboot {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
handleAppendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, AppendEntriesReply (currentTerm state) entries false) else if prevLogIndex =? 0 then if haveNewEntries state entries then ({[{[{[{[advanceCurrentTerm state t with log := entries]} with commitIndex := Init.Nat.max (commitIndex state) (Init.Nat.min leaderCommit (maxIndex entries))]} with type := Follower]} with leaderId := Some leaderId]}, AppendEntriesReply t entries true) else ({[{[advanceCurrentTerm state t with type := Follower]} with leaderId := Some leaderId]}, AppendEntriesReply t entries true) else match findAtIndex (log state) prevLogIndex with |...
all_fin_all : forall (n : nat) (x : fin n), In x (all_fin n)
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
applyEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix applyEntries (h : name) (st : raft_data) (entries : list entry) {struct entries} : list raft_output * raft_data := match entries with | [] => ([], st) | e :: es => let (out, st0) := cacheApplyEntry st e in let out0 := if name_eq_dec (eAt e) h then map (fun o : output => ClientResponse (eClient e) (eId e) o) out else [] in let (out', state) := applyEntries h st0 es in (out0 ++ out', state) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data -> list entry -> list raft_output * raft_data Arguments applyEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _ _%list_scope
RIR_doGenericServer : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doGenericServer h (nwState net h) = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RIR_doLeader : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (h : Net.name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doLeader (nwState net h) h = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}

```coq
intros n st t c li lt st' ms H.
unfold handleRequestVote in H.
destruct (Nat.ltb t (currentTerm st)) eqn:H1.
- inversion H.
- destruct (advanceCurrentTerm st t) as [st_a _] eqn:H2.
  destruct (andb (orb (negb (leaderId st_a)) (moreUpToDate li lt (maxTerm (log st_a)) (maxIndex (log st_a)))) true) eqn:H3.
  + inversion H; subst.
    reflexivity.
  + destruct (votedFor st_a) eqn:H4.
    * inversion H.
    * inversion H.
Qed
```

original: intros n st t c li lt st' ms H. unfold handleRequestVote in H. destruct (Nat.ltb t (currentTerm st)) eqn:H1. - inversion H. - destruct (advanceCurrentTerm st t) as [st_a _] eqn:H2. destruct (andb (orb (negb (leaderId st_a)) (moreUpToDate li lt (maxTerm (log st_a)) (maxIndex (log st_a)))) true) eqn:H3. + inversion H; subst. reflexivity. + destruct (votedFor st_a) eqn:H4. * inversion H. * inversion H. Qed.
